topics.body:
Triple posting cause fuck it:
So I was playing the Urban Legend in Limbo Demo(latest touhou game in production) and I noticed something; chunks of the game are in english.  Zun, the creator, said he wanted to bring the games to the west and he was working towards that end with english downloadable versions in production and it may come to steam.
(video of game hyperlinked in image)
"!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/865/373/1d1.jpg!":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oFjEDbaI2vA
(Before someone goes "I don't understand what is going on in the video" it's still mostly in japanese and a demo and the story isn't shown.)

Tl:dr; Touhou is coming to the west in a couple months; prepare yourself cause chances are this is going to be the next big thing.

!http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/721/145/a60.gif!

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a15cf2636872673ca60e00#post_54a15cf2636872673ca60e00
WAIT NEW BEIONICLES WHEN HOW WHAT HOLEY SHET I MUST HAVE-

>checks website
>checks out toys
>realizes its all a REBOOT
>checks out story so far

...I have no idea what to make of it. I used to be a HUGE fanboy of the toys back during its prime, but now all I see is a reboot Bionicle, not the toyline/story I grew up playing, watching, and reading. I'm not trying to say it's bad, but as a reboot...I'm not sure if it captures the same spirit of the original. I mean, it looks like they're trying to retell the Mata Nui saga all over again, except it looks like they took out a whole bunch of stuff, and 'changed' some names to make it look like it's new or something.

I'm glad its back, but I'm not took keen on the "Hero Factory" look of it, and I never liked Hero Factory. Not that it replaced it, but the toys don't even look "Bionicle-ish" to me. I honestly stop collecting Bionicles after the series ended back in 2010, and it was a dark and sad day for me. Heck, I don't even thing some of the stories after the end went anywhere. But I finally got to see Mata Nui give Makuta his just deserts after ALL OF THE CRAP HE GOT AWAY WITH. Too best the rest of the final battle was meh. It was almost like the end of the Lord of the Rings, except its just ends right at the point where Sauron dies, and people just go 'okay we won, now what?"

Hope the new Bionicle becomes something great and amazing, but this new take on it is a far cry from the original take. I have faith in it, but I also have my doubts. It's just I'll have to get used to it. And I hope it becomes something worthwhile, for fans of new and old. I was there for the Old Legends, but it looks like a new story based on an old tale is about to be told...

(inb4 Bionicle thread is created)
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000
